title: Resize logo and apply circular styling

requirements.text: Replace the current logo image with the uploaded circular logo (cropped_circle_image.png) in all sizes

quotes: Size  CIRCULE ME karo aur perfect karo

acceptanceCriteria: The uploaded circular logo replaces existing logo assets
Logo maintains circular appearance across all placements

requirements.text: Adjust the logo size in the Header component to be appropriately scaled and ensure circular styling is preserved with proper CSS (rounded-full or equivalent)

quotes: Size  CIRCULE ME karo aur perfect karo

acceptanceCriteria: Logo size is visually balanced in the header
Circular shape is maintained with CSS styling
Logo displays correctly on mobile and desktop viewports

constraints: Preserve existing Header component structure and functionality
nonGoals: Modifying other header elements besides the logo
